name: The Elven Curse
description:
An elf has had a powerful curse placed upon her. Now she must venture into the dungeons to destroy the artifact powering the spell. She will have to deal with complications as they develop. Break the curse!

Available now is the current concept build of the game. It features light exploration and some combat. It is a chance to try out the foundation of what will form the game.

In game Controls:

  • F1 to open in game menu
  • Arrow keys used for movement
  • C to interact
  • X to attack (after picking up the knife)
  • Esc to exit the game

Thanks for playing!  Opportunities to help support development available on Patreon.

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=30763284&fan_landing=true
